author: mirror
title: Is Sinead actually pregnant with Chesney's baby? Coronation Street viewers predict boyfriend Daniel is NOT the daddy
text:
Is Sinead actually pregnant with Chesney's baby? Coronation Street viewers predict boyfriend Daniel is NOT the daddy Things never run smoothly in Weatherfield... Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
They say drama is never far from the cobbles of Coronation Street - and, once again, that proved true in Friday's episode of the ITV show. 
Viewers were sent into a conspiracy theory spin as they watched Sinead Tinker cast doubt over the paternity of her unborn baby. 
Fans of the show were left reeling with the possibility that the ditzy blonde, played by Katie McGlynn, may actually be carrying ex-boyfriend Chesney's child, rather than that of her current man, Daniel. 
It comes after she was seen confiding in her Aunt Beth about her pregnancy, which TV insiders believe may still end in abortion as she struggles to be sure. Sinead Tinker has raised viewers' eyebrows over the paternity of her baby (Photo: ITV) Read More Michelle Keegan and Mark Wright cuddle up on 'special' romantic ski trip in the French Alps 
Viewers of Coronation Street were equally dubious about the child's father. After Sinead said she was "100% sure its Daniel's", one said on Twitter: "I bet Sinead's 100% WRONG lol #Corrie". 
Another added: "I bet that Sinead's baby is Chesney's...#corrie" while a third chimed in: "It is definitely Chesney's baby. I'm telling you now #Corrie." 
Others also waded into the fray, adding: "Watching Corrie and Sinead saying that her baby is Daniel's so it probably that other bloke's," and: "Sinead is just covering herself #Corrie". Katie Mcglynn as Sinead in the ITV soap (Photo: ITV) Read More Coronation Street spoilers: Will Peter betray Toyah and wreck her plans for a baby? 
Discussing the sensitive storyline, Katie explained to The Sun : “Sinead and Chesney have been together forever and she’s just grown up. They’ve been arguing. 
"Daniel sees a quirky girl in Sinead and he calls her mysterious and exotic. The situation with Chesney kind of pushes them together.” 
“They first sleep together in the factory. Daniel needs somewhere quiet to study and Sinead keeps doing overtime at the factory so she invites him to work there." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
